channel.title: Performance on Discovery notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Performance on Discovery notebook

item.title: Index explained
item.description:
Back-of-the-book index: includes names of people, places, events, and concepts selected by the indexer as being relevant and of interest to a possible reader of the book. (Wikipedia)

Database index: data structure that improves the speed of data retrieval operations on a database table. (Wikipedia)
